articles.title: Android's new 'Expanded' dark mode darkens apps without a dark theme — but there's a catch - Android Authority
articles.description: Android has a new "Expanded" dark mode that can darken apps that don't have a native dark theme. Here's what it looks like.
articles.content:
• For accessibility, Android will soon let you enable a dark theme in apps that dont have one.
  • A new Expanded dark mode option forces apps to go dark, but it may cause visual issues.
